column1: AAAI Technical Track: Constraint Satisfaction and Optimization
Current Maximum Satisfiability (MaxSAT) algorithms based on successive calls to a powerful Satisfiability (SAT) solver are now able to solve real-world instances in many application domains. Moreover
column2: replacing the SAT solver with a Satisfiability Modulo Theories (SMT) solver enables effective MaxSMT algorithms. However
column3: MaxSMT has seldom been used in debugging multi-threaded software.
